scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run --filter host dev" "bun run --filter auth preview" "bun run --filter customers preview"
scripts.build: bun run --filter host build && bun run --filter auth build && bun run --filter customers build
scripts.clean: bun --filter host clean && bun run --filter auth clean && bun run --filter customers clean
scripts.lint: bun --filter host lint && bun run --filter auth lint && bun run --filter customers lint
scripts.deploy:host: bun run build:host && echo 'Deploy host para produção'
scripts.deploy:auth: bun run build:auth && echo 'Deploy auth para produção'
scripts.deploy:customers: bun run build:customers && echo 'Deploy customers para produção'
scripts.deploy:all: bun run build && echo 'Deploy todos os microfrontends para produção'
